FuncDef: This command overrides themax-rateparameters configured in the hsmda-scheduler-policy associated with the egress port or ingress MDA. When amax-rateis defined at the override level, the HSMDA scheduler policy smax-rateparameter is ignored.

ParaDef.Info: The rate parameter is mutually exclusive to specifying the max keyword. When executing the max-rate override command either the keyword max or a rate in megabits-per-second must be specified. Values-1 to 10000, max (Mb/s).

The max keyword is mutually exclusive to specifying a rate in megabits-per-second. When executing the max-rate override command either the keyword max or a rate in megabits-per-second must be specified. The max keyword removes an existing rate limit from the HSMDA scheduler context.
